team.name: Pranshu Chaudhary
team.bio: As an Interaction Designer, Pranshu crafts meaningful digital experiences that bridge the gap between human needs and technological possibilities. With a keen eye for user behavior and a passion for innovative interfaces, he specializes in creating intuitive interactions that feel natural and delightful. His work focuses on merging traditional design principles with cutting-edge technology to create experiences that resonate on a deeper level.

team.name: Udhayan RM
team.bio: Udhayan brings stories to life through the power of motion and visual narrative. As a filmmaker and 3D animation artist, he combines technical expertise with creative storytelling to create immersive visual experiences. His work spans from cinematic storytelling to interactive 3D environments, always pushing the boundaries of what's possible in digital storytelling.

team.name: Monalisa Thakur
team.bio: Monalisa weaves visual narratives into meaningful product experiences. As a visual storyteller and product designer, she brings a unique perspective that combines aesthetic sensibility with functional design thinking. Her approach to design focuses on creating products that not only solve problems but also tell compelling stories through their form and function.

sectionDescription: Meet the creative minds behind Studio Poetics. We're a diverse team of designers, storytellers, and technologists working together to create meaningful experiences.
